metadata.name: Potential MsiExec Masquerading
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of msiexec.exe from an uncommon directory

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\msiexec.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('\\msiexec.exe') AND NOT (startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\windows\\syswow64\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\windows\\winsxs\\'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of msiexec.exe from an uncommon directory
